DOC.brief_summary: Several study demonstrate D2 treatment associate decrease 25 ( OH ) D3 level therefore propose D3 would preferable term raise total 25 ( OH ) D level . The investigator postulate D2 treatment-associated decrease 25 ( OH ) D3 level may relate increase total 25 ( OH ) D level rather specific D2 treatment , thus would D3 treatment-associated decrease 25 ( OH ) D2 level . The investigator plan conduct double-blind placebo-controlled trial examine effect D3 treatment 25 ( OH ) D2 level effect D2 treatment 25 ( OH ) D3 leve
DOC.brief_title: Is Vitamin D2 Treatment-associated Decrease 25 ( OH ) D3 Level Reciprocal Phenomena ?
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : nonpregnant adult ( age â‰¥18 year ) healthy total 25 ( OH ) D level 20 65 nmol/L . live Riyadh area Exclusion criterion : consumption one serve milk daily take vitamin D supplement habitual weekly sun exposure 10 hour history granulomatous , liver , kidney disease take anticonvulsant , barbiturate , steroid
